Stripe prod confirmed options — signup flow, email verification, PostHog
feat: add Mevan data extraction list support
feat: add rake task to seed Cyber Liability proposal template
Stripe prod — PostHog analytics, email verification refinements

docs: add Chameleon setup video guide

web.title: ENG-1629 — Fix overscroll & scroll CSS architecture
Chrome extension — parsing doc IDs from URL params
Pass through classification_intent in chat message flow
fix: prevent UploadModal from dismissing on drag-and-drop in chat

ENG-1719 — Detect corrupt documents on upload

llm-service.title: Add classification_intent and expand taxonomy to 17 categories

features.title: Production Signup & Billing Flow
features.description: Complete self-service signup with Stripe billing, email verification, domain-based organization matching, and manual approval for personal email addresses.
details: Self-service Stripe billing integration with trial period tracking
Email verification flow with Postmark templates
Domain-based organization matching — users from known domains are routed to their existing org
Manual approval workflow for personal email signups (Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo)
PostHog analytics integration for user identification and subscription event tracking
Slack notifications for new signups and existing-org matches

features.title: Proposal Generation V3
features.description: Completely reworked proposal generation engine with document metadata support and a new Cyber Liability template.
details: New generation logic with document metadata extraction across API and LLM services
Cyber Liability proposal template seeded via rake task
Improved document context passed to LLM for more accurate proposals

features.title: Chrome Extension Support
features.description: Backend and frontend support for the Qumis Chrome extension, enabling users to interact with Qumis directly from their browser.
details: New ext_chrome chat message source type for extension-originated conversations
OCR status field exposed in document API responses
URL-based document ID parsing for extension deep links

features.title: Chat Intent Classification
features.description: Automatically categorizes user chat messages into 17 intent categories for analytics and future routing improvements.
details: New classification_intent column on chat messages with migration and backfill rake task
17-category taxonomy covering policy analysis, claims, compliance, and more
Intent passed through the full stack from LLM classification to frontend display

features.title: Corrupt Document Detection
features.description: Validates document integrity on upload, catching corrupt PDFs and other damaged files before they enter the processing pipeline.
details: Client-side file integrity validation with magic byte checks for PDF, DOCX, XLSX, and images
PDF structural parse and page render validation using pdf.js
Clear user-facing error messages for corrupt, invalid, or password-protected files
Prevents 12+ minutes of silent failure from corrupt files entering OCR pipeline

features.title: Mevan Data Extraction List
features.description: Support for Mevan data extraction list format, expanding the range of structured data the platform can process.
details: New data extraction list type in the API

userFacing.description: Fixed quadruple overflow-hidden nesting and global overscroll-behavior that caused broken scroll behavior in chat, layout, and nested containers
Fixed UploadModal dismissing when dragging files or switching windows in chat — stabilized React component identity and prevented Radix Dialog premature dismissal
Fixed bottom alignment of the chat input footer

backend.description: Sign-up notifications now route to the correct channel with a new alert for existing-org matches
Removed unnecessary presence check for organization name during creation that could block signups
Fixed Chameleon sync to use the profiles webhook endpoint instead of identify

improvements.title: Chameleon setup documentation
improvements.description: Added video guide and setup instructions for Chameleon analytics integration

improvements.title: Usage stats backfill
improvements.description: Added first_report_complete backfill to usage stats rake task for accurate onboarding metrics
